title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year

Share of respondents is rapidly decreasing from A_lifetime to 11_to_20_years, rapidly increasing from 11_to_20_years to 2_to_5_years, and lastly rapidly decreasing from 2_to_5_years to Less_than_two_years.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year A_lifetime and 11_to_20_years.
Max Share of respondents about 77.0 was recorded at Year A_lifetime
Min Share of respondents about 2.0 was recorded at Year 11_to_20_years, and Less_than_two_years
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from A_lifetime to 2_to_5_years.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2_to_5_years to Less_than_two_years.
